revert - this doesn't really work as a lead -
Date maintenance tags and general fixes
/* Sociological definitions of religion */ unecessary and unreferenced
/* Definitions */ citation needed for over a year ... "homonymic conflict" does not factor into any notable research on this topic
/* Sexual gratification by leaders */ again ... absolutely no encyclopedic reason to include this sensationalistic detail about sexual misconduct ... not sure the section belongs either
/* Criticism by former members */ remove section ... completely unencyclopedic ... if any of that is notable it can go to the relevant entry pages
moving to appropriate place ... for now
/* Non-religious groups characterized as cults */ tag
/* Documented crimes */ absolutely no need for this detail in a general entry on "cult" ... completely absurd ... these incidents are covered elsewhere ... also removing dubious additions
/* Documented crimes */ a wikipedia entry cannot be used as a reference
/* Media attention */ another uninformative and redundant section ... delet
/* Prevalence of all NRMs compared to destructive cults */ uninformative section partially based on OR relating to a non existent entry
/* Definitions */ delete word origins ... if at all this should be in the lede
